column5: Hi guys! It's been almost a week since I've been on Detroit river for walleye fishing. Together with my buddies Cas and Robert and with Jon Bondy, an well know professional angler from Windsor area, we had a blast on Saturday may 7. Weather was awesome,sunny and 18 C, no wind from early morning to mid afternoon. We had continuous action from early as 7:00 am until way pas mid day. We where targeting walleye and we had an fantastic day..16 walleye in less then 8 hours. We where jigging in 15-25 ft of water, with strong current but we had Jon as a guide and his jigging technique for rivers worked awesome. This guy really know what he's doing. Thank you Jon Bondy for an awesome day of fishing!  http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01284.jpg http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01300.jpg http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01301.jpg http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01307.jpg http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01308.jpg http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01314.jpg http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01315.jpg http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01321.jpg http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu58/gino197/Detroit%20river%20walleye%20may%202011/DSC01322.jpg
Nice collection of Walleys there - perfect weather. Water looks perfect too. Congrats.
Nice collection of walleyes Gino     Got to love it when the fishes come out to play Thanks for sharing!!!  Hope you don't mind.... fixed the pics for you. Leechman
